original_solution_mapping.L1: After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=16>>16 more ceilings to paint.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 ceilings.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Michelangelo will have 16-3=<<16-3=13>>13 more ceilings to paint.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 640.
    Returns: the number of ceilings left to paint after next week.
    """
    # L1
    total_ceilings = 28 # Michelangelo has 28 ceilings to paint
    painted_this_week = 12 # he paints 12 of them
    remaining_after_this_week = total_ceilings - painted_this_week

    # L2
    fraction_denominator = 4 # 1/4 the number of ceilings
    painted_next_week = painted_this_week / fraction_denominator

    # L3
    remaining_after_next_week = remaining_after_this_week - painted_next_week

    # FA
    answer = remaining_after_next_week
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: After this week, Michelangelo will have {total_ceilings}-{painted_this_week}=<<{total_ceilings}-{painted_this_week}={remaining_after_this_week}>>{remaining_after_this_week} more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint {painted_this_week}/{fraction_denominator}=<<{painted_this_week}/{fraction_denominator}={painted_next_week}>>{painted_next_week} ceilings.

Michelangelo will have {remaining_after_this_week}-{painted_next_week}=<<{remaining_after_this_week}-{painted_next_week}={remaining_after_next_week}>>{remaining_after_next_week} more ceilings to paint.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=40>>40 more ceilings to paint.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 ceilings.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Michelangelo will have 40-3=<<40-3=37>>37 more ceilings to paint.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
